contentrichtext.text: [[File:Map of Aichi Prefecture, showing Jushiyama.png|thumb|Jūshiyama in Aichi Prefecture]] {{nihongo|'''Jūshiyama'''|十四山村|Jūshiyama-mura}} was a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Ama District, Aichi|Ama District]], [[Aichi Prefecture|Aichi]], [[Japan]]. On April 1, 2006 Jūshiyama was merged into the town of [[Yatomi, Aichi|Yatomi]] to gain the city status. As of 2003, the village had an estimated [[population]] of 5,687 and a [[population density|density]] of 570.41 persons per km². The total area was 9.97 km². ==External links== * [http://www.city.yatomi.aichi.jp/ Yatomi official website] {{ja icon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Jushiyama, Aichi}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Aichi Prefecture]] {{Aichi-geo-stub}}
